tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had underwent hair transplant on 5th of Jan. It was done perfectly by Dr. Sreedhar and his team. I only experienced minor pains when anesthesia was being injected, that too for a short duration. Nothing during or after surgery. Things were well managed and my planted grafts are growing.__

Also, the clinic shares the main contact number where I have got almost immediate responses for all my queries post the procedure. There are NO CHARGES for any consultation before (Yes!) or after the transplants. I have pinged for a number of queries regarding my earlier ayurvedic medicine and supplements/ ointments, his medicines, side effects, other brand medicines, interactions etc. I have got satisfactory responses every time both in calls and WhatsApp.__

I recommend this clinic to everyone.

Awesome doctor and staff is very friendly in nature and explains the treatment process very clearly.
Pioneer Poly clinic is very well maintained and hygiene as well. Entire equipment is completely advanced and nothing less than world class infrastructure. Strongly recommend to visit this clinic for best hair growth results. Rather than wasting your money by going to other clinic.

That was amazing experience with Dr sreedhar he explained pros&cons about surgery.. he examined my scalp and recommended for BIO PRP instead of HT, price is reasonable can say affordable I'm very happy with my visit and Thanks to Dr vinod for indetail explanation about benefits of PRP
looking forward to meet you again for second PRP
Many Thanks
I went there i didn't Met sridhar reddy but i met one lady doctor. She was friendly and cleared my all doubts, so that I can say, anyone can go for there.
He was very patient. Explained the further actions without prescribing any medication. And the clinic charged no Consultation fees. I will definitely visit for the further treatments
Great doctor, Very friendly. Doctor suggested PRP treatment for me and some multivitamins .Thank you so much doctor.
Friendly staff and Doctor. For my hairfall he suggested prp. I did 3 session and post that hairfall reduced

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Doctors are very friendly
Doctors explanation easily understanding

Value for money
